  • Uses of Question in com.quizapp.quiz.backend.service

    Methods in com.quizapp.quiz.backend.service that return Question
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Question
    MultiFactMixQuizService.getNextQuestion()
    Retrieves one random game that meets the criteria (has release date, rating, and platforms defined) and generates a question based on a random template (0-6).
    Question
    RetroQuizService.getNextRetroQuestion()
    Retrieves one random game released before 2010 and generates a question based on a random template (0-3).
    Question
    GenreChallengeService.getRandomQuestion()
    Retrieves a single random game with genre information and converts it into a quiz question.
    Question
    NewReleasesService.getRandomQuestion()
    Retrieves one random game released after 2020-01-01 and generates a question based on a random template (0-3).
    Question
    PlatformMatchService.getSinglePlatformQuestion()
    Retrieves one random game with platform data and generates a question based on a random template (0-10).
    Question
    RatingEstimatorQuizService.getSingleRatingQuestion()
    Retrieves one random game that has a rating defined and generates a question based on a random template (0-4).
